description:
Don Krieg promises further malice as he returns to his ship, but the threat to the Baratie proves short-lived as an even bigger threat arrives!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mamore Baratie! Daikaizoku Akaashi no Zeff
Protect Baratie! The Great Pirate, Red Foot Zeff!
Sauvez le BARATIE ! Le grand pirate Zeff aux Pieds Rouges
ปกป้องบาราติเอ! เซฟขาแดง!
守れバラティエ! 大海賊・赫足のゼフ
